metadata.title: USN-4520-1 -- Exim SpamAssassin vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Exim SpamAssassin does not properly handle  configuration strings. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2019-19920)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4520-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  sa-exim - 4.2.1-14+deb8u1build0.16.04.1 No subscription required
